entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CPU set affinity is not respected by ProcessorCount on Windows #94364
  • GeneratedComClass doesn't apply to inherited classes #94357
  • GeneratedComClass on a generic class causes generator to crash #94356
    8.0.x
  • Incorrect GNU linker detection when cross-compiling on non-GNU-linker host OS #94355
  • Enable CMake policy CMP0117 and update the corresponding compile options throughout the repo. #94354
    Future
  • [wasm][post-MVP] tailcall proposal in .NET #94352
    Future
  • [tracking] .NET support for post-MVP WebAssembly Proposals #94351
    9.0.0
  • RyuJIT inliner is inconsistent in its handling of the `ALWAYS_INLINE_SIZE` threshold #94349
  • Unhandled NullReferenceException in System.Net.Sockets.SocketPal.GetIPPacketInformation() causing process termination #94346
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: new constructor ReadOnlySequence(IEnumerable<ReadOnlyMemory<T>>) #94341
  • Can't start a `Process` if `StartInfo.EnvironmentVariables` is called or evaluated on Windows systems #94338
  • Configuration binder failing on 7.0-alpine on GCP Kubernetes #94336
    9.0.0
  • CPU time vs code size tradeoffs #94334
  • JIT incorrectly adds handles to integer constants #94332
    8.0.x
  • question: system text json warning on netcoreapp3.1 target framework #94327
  • dotnet workload fails to install microsoft.net.sdk.android.manifest-7.0.100.msi.x64 (33.0.95) #94326

Closed

  • Blazor WASM (8.0 RC2) does not work on iOS 15.8 #94231
    8.0.x
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator generates code without a using for a Type #94065
    9.0.0
  • Memory leak when serializing large string properties with System.Text.Json #94290
  • Bumping min supported iOS/tvOS/macCatalyst version to 12 in .net 9 #94345
  • [InlineArray] should not have [EditorBrowsableState(Never)] #94283
  • [regression/8.0.0] [iOS] After migration from net7.0-ios to net8.0-ios app crashes randomly in release mode with UseInterpreter="False" #93684
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGenerationRollover #88027
    9.0.0
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGenerationRollover #91304
    9.0.0
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWrite.Test_Write_T_ETW #91769
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Emit exception blocks for the new ILGenerator #94366
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • JIT: cross-block local assertion prop in morph #94363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable the Jitted Methods Counting Test When SSE2 is Disabled #94362
    test-bug, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix reundant conditional in OleDbDataReader.ProcessResults #94360
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • More general VN const casting #94359
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Trying to fix performance regression. #94358
    needs-area-label
  • Replace `pushd/popd` Calls With `-S/-B` CMake Flags in the Build System #94353
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix fgOptimizeAddition opt for AOT #94350
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert DIV/MOD to UDIV/UMOD using assertions #94347
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove [EditorBrowsable(Never)] from [InlineArray], add XML docs #94343
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Allow RyuJIT to refer to frozen RuntimeType instances #94342
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Unblock building with UseLocalAppHostPack #94340
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • feat: add new IMemoryCache extensions #94335
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Fix the type of handle constants replacing TYP_REF expressions #94330
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V]Delete unused code in LowerConstIntDivOrMod #94328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0

Merged

  • we need to skip the SIP region in the last step of handling the alloc region #94249
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Mono Interlocked fixes #94274
    area-VM-threading-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix LONG constant case in assertion prop #94331
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add xcall opcodes to model methods returning simd values. #94329
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [RISC-V] Clear build warnings in Mono #94344
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono][ci] Improve CI perf by excluding intermediate dir from iOS app bundles #94304
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • BigInteger constructor perf #91176
    area-System.Numerics, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • JIT: revise local assertion prop to use bit vectors #94322
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing endianness issues on S390x #94333
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Remove [EditorBrowsable(Never)] from [InlineArray], add XML docs #94308
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Make System.Diagnostics.Tracing.Tests run sequentially #94324
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • Re-enable S.T.Json with source generation tests #94320
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Provide Microsoft.Win32.Registry.AccessControl package readme #94321
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution

Updated

  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [ILLink analyzer] Add branch analysis #94123
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [Mono] Enable IL strip for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Implements new `int`and `long` overloads for `TimeSpan` #94143
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add IO.Ports packaging for linux-musl #92145
    area-System.IO.Ports
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use fully qualified names when referencing user types. (#94267) #94307
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.x
  • Vector128.ShuffleUnsafe #88559
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping #82765
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Sanitize Reg Entries in SerialPort.GetPortNames (Issue 93240) #93242
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Ports
  • [release/8.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94243
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test-bug, 8.0.x
  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [browser][MT] fix stale memory on suspended thread #94299
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Make ValueTuple members that can be made readonly readonly #90773
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix binding types with optional string parameters #93563
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Improve performance of BigInteger.Multiply(large, small) #92208
    area-System.Numerics, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix redundant conditional in HttpConnection #94278
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing #93920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use BigMul for 32x32=64 in decimal #93345
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Implement StoreVectorNxM for Arm64 #94129
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use `StoreAligned` not `Store` in WidenAsciiToUtf16 #89892
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] enable MT PLINQ #94214
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • StringBuilder.Replace with ReadOnlySpan<char> #93938
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] Move PublishTrimmed=true from pack to SDK #93456
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Arm64: SVE/SVE2 encodings #94285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable aligned_alloc on macOS #94298
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-mac-os-x, os-ios
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalar for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Optimize Ascii.Equals for small values #93191
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux #93901
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #93043
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Optimize Interlocked.CompareExchange use in Task #93953
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [linux-bionic] Skip failing NTLM tests #92830
    area-System.Net.Security, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix: unmanaged memory leak on parsing ill-formed certificates #93647
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add tests for Task.WhenAll #93619
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #88620
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • reduce handle table lock contention #94159
    area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ContainerArchiveOutputPath is not effecive on new .NET 8 container support while running on Framework #36651
  • [NETSDKE2E][VS64][Unstable][Regression]"Unable to read data from the transport connection: An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host..." error happens during publish project in CLI. #36643

Closed

  • src/Containers/Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers/LocalDaemons/ArchiveFileRegistry.cs #36649
  • No frameworks were found but actually installed #36594

PullRequests

Created

  • add missing --archiveoutputpath option to .NET Framework container tool task #36652
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • update editorconfig template #36642
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change the format of tool exceptions and NuGet API exceptions to be graceful #36641
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Reenable AOT tests disabled during the net9 migration #36636
    untriaged

Updated

  • Switch back to the RC2 build since GA has gone internal. #36578
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2307606 #36497
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Update stage0 #36621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • The call is ambiguous when using collections literals with interpolated strings #7651

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix typo in file extensions #7650

Updated

  • Add proposal for partial type inference #7582

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Code fix for `csharp_prefer_braces = true` adds blank line if another statement follows #70697
  • Implicit Conversion to FormattableString Fails with Ternary Operator #70689

Closed

  • Consider move length-based string dispatch behind /optimize #69674
    17.9
  • EnableGenerateDocumentationFile analyzer is a breaking change #70460
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Link to topic about choosing diagnostic IDs #70700
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Do not bail out of unused parameter analysis if encountered a `nameof` expression #70699
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid some first-chance exceptions by returning instead #70695
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid cycle in tuple explicit interface implementation #70694
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add null literal to list of standard implicit conversions #70693
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Sentence correction #70692
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Include razor diagnostic details in assert text #70691
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove deprecated variable groups #70690
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Indicate when syntax errors are first calculated. #70688
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Only use length-based dispatch optimization under `/optimize+` #70680
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70698
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Restrict EnableGenerateDocumentationFile to .NET 8 warning wave #70491
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2307001 #70681

Updated

  • Only change documents in solution #70669
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revise compound assignment for nullable #70687
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged
  • Method group natural type: only use methods that can be fully substituted and pass constraint checks #69226
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Integration fixes #70635
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, 17.9
  • Add nested code actions to csharp extension #70475
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle ref returning receivers in dynamic calls #70676
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: IOperation support #70650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [.NET 8 Blazor] HeadContent in .razor page should be APPENDED to, not replace any in the MainLayout #51864
  • SourceGen NativeOverlapped PInvokes #51863
  • Blazor Web App template with global WebAssembly interactivity doesn't compile #51862
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #51861
  • When will Windows Authentication for Blazor Web App template be added to Visual Studio 2022 Preview 3 #51860
    Backlog
  • No documentation or support for projects that use @angular/localize #51859
  • How to bypass "Pick an account" popup after Sign out #51858
  • TypeError: Failed to fetch in Blazor .net 8.0 with InteractiveAuto #51857
  • Hot reload does not see any changes not back end not front end #51856
    .NET 9 Planning
  • ASP0018 does not work with non-literals #51855
  • Strange message loss when a client sends a message to hub #51853
  • dotnet build fails on codespace #51848
  • Blazor full-stack: server-only pages prerender before they 404, creating a jarring FOUC #51847
  • Unable to communicate with pods in Kubernetes after upgrading to 8.0.100-rc.2 #51845
  • [Blazor] Clearer way to troubleshoot complex state transitions #51844
  • Published size improvement: todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #51843
  • Perf regression: https #51842
  • Perf regression: https, json, single_query #51841
  • Error unprotecting the IdentityServer signing key with kid {kid} #51839
  • Cancellation support for StreamRendering #51838
  • net8 blazor interactive modes are so flaky to work with #51837
  • MapRazorComponents broken with FallbackPolicy RequireAuthenticatedUser #51836

Closed

  • Unexplained custom model binding / validation behaviour #46960
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #51840
  • Tough-cookie upgrade in SignalR typescript client #51849
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #51793
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #51832
  • When will Blazor have a better debugging method in vscode? #51693
  • SendPasswordResetLinkAsync Identity RC2 - Not clear #51278
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix duplicate add of items to Compile on Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Client.targets #51846
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution

Merged

  • Use generated PInvokes and exchange types #50685
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Update HubConnection.ts to provide a easier to read order of SignalR params #51559
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `5b7fd63` to `b10fad3` #51852
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • 47569 - Using FrozenDictionary in HttpMethodDictionaryPolicyJumpTable #51803
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #51612
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #51616
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add API to configure scope validation for dependency injection #18519
  • [iOS] CollectionView has more logical children than items (potential memory leak) #18517
  • [Windows] App with FlexLayout crashes when resizing window #18515
  • PickMultipleAsync returns after first pick on Android #18514
  • Scrollview shifts content down when a subview element visibility changes (after scrolling). #18513
  • Keeping WebView state across two pages is not working on Android #18512
  • [WinUI] CollectionVIew scrolling performance #18510
    .NET 8 SR1
  • MAUI Helloworld - NuGet packages restore process Error #18509
  • SwipeGestureRecognizer is not working on Android. Event handlers are never called. #18507
  • Switch on Android has wrong initial color #18506
  • [Android] CollectionVIew scrolling performance on MAUI lags compared to XF #18505
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] When setting ImageSource on a Button, LayoutOptions are completely ignored #18504
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Map pins are not updated if the ItemsSource collection sends Reset event #18503
    Backlog
  • [IOS] Stacklayout BindableLayout is out of bounds when using nested Refreshview #18502
    .NET 8 SR1
  • iOS platform-specific safe area layout not working with control template #18501
  • iOS hot reload not working #18498
  • Skia graphics default font change bug. #18497
  • [iOS] Updating the text of a label destroys the ScrollView layout #18496
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows]When using Navigation deferral, flyout indicates that the selected item is incorrect #18495
    Backlog

Closed

  • MAUI Blazor android wont go after splash page at release version (.NET 8 preview 7) #17184
  • MSAL - PublicClientApplication - GetAccountsAsync() doesn't return any Accounts in windows maui #17623
  • .NET MAUI, set Entry style error #17634
  • [Android] Canvas shadow didn't get applied for the drawn ellipse #9059
  • Star columns not computed correctly when ScrollView spans across all of them #15105
  • Slider doesn't work #18469
  • [Bug] Unable to set image as ContentPage BackgroundImageSource #17766
    .NET 8 SR1
  • TextBlock.IsTextTrimmed property does not change and TextBlock.IsTextTrimmedEvent does not fire on the Web or mobile #18516
  • Error in the manifest when I try to register ActionBootCompleted (MAUI Android) #15009
  • xamarin_process_managed_exception caused by MainPage initialization #14626
  • android runtime error #14580
  • When loading json into the editor control the double quotes get replaces with invalid quotes #18220
  • Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: 'Can not perform this action after onSaveInstanceState' #18368
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Easy way to get Color from Colors.xaml #14007
    Backlog
  • Let WebView receive messages from the WebSite #14325
  • Border with StrokeShape RoundRectangle does not apply rounding to all corners #18453
  • The underline of label is not displayed on ios and maccatalyst #7486
  • Add required permissions in API documentation #6833
  • API Documentation #3960
  • WebView RequestMediaCapturePermission #17431
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • - [Android] Fix ShouldShowToolbarButton for FlyoutPage #18522
    community ✨
  • Only use custom image sizing with ImageButtons #18521
  • Fix broadcast receiver register on android 14.0/34+ #18520
  • Enable Dependabot #18511
  • Improves performance of GetLayoutHandlerIndex #18499
    area/layout 🔲, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨

Merged

  • Fix the logging messages #18518
  • [iOS] Fix ContentPage BackgroundImageSource not working #17789
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, .NET 8 SR1
  • Add the versions to the ProjectCapabilities #18494
  • Add 8.0.0-rc.2.9511 to bug template #18508
  • Fix the incorrect manifest project name #18488

Updated

  • Add device test for PR #18356 #18387
  • Validate service provider scopes #18492
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Create a new Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Maui .NET SDK #14640
    area/setup 🪄
  • [Android] Fix RefreshView loading indicator position #17647
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview, .NET 8 SR1
  • Backport #16762 - [windows] fix memory leak in ListView #18463
    area/ListView
  • Improves performance on BindableProperty #17756
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, s/pr-needs-author-input, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • [Catalyst] Allow to use a custom WKUIDelegate on WebView #18483
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix wrong gray color using transparent in iOS gradients #17696
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Avoid crash using RotateYTo and RotateXTo #18484
    t/bug, area/animation 🎬, platform/windows 🪟
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Correctly clear text tapping the clear button on Entry #17543
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, .NET 8 SR1
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18472
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Usage and maturity of ChangingAndChangedNotifications #32230
  • migrationBuilder.UpdateData() translates TimeOnly to wrong time in SQL (AM/PM Issue) #32229
  • Support translating complex type equality when one/both of them is a subquery #32228
  • Check for custom sql translation defined on C# special methods: op_LessThan, op_GreaterThan, etc. #32227
  • Loading a Many-to-Many Collection as SplitQuery throws NullReferenceException #32225
  • Use getter to get count of collection without write in Select() #32224
  • ValueConverter for entity. #32222

Closed

  • Contains fallback translation fails when the array parameter has AsQueryable #32218
  • Is RelationalQueryableExtensions.ExecuteUpdateAsync meant to ignore cancellation? #32223

PullRequests

Merged

  • Visit arguments in QueryableMethodNormalizingExpressionVisitor after converting List.Contains #32219
  • Take into account Contains item visitation in SqlNullabilityProcessor #32214

Updated

  • Make ModelBuilderTest asserts more robust and extensible #32221
    providers-beware
  • Add more tests for ConventionSet and fix the found issues. #32220

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
  • Unwind changes made to temporarily unblock the .net 9 codflow #17453

PullRequests

Created

  • [source build] Use floating tags for container image names #17696
  • Bump `darc` to fix VMR synchronization edge case #17693

Updated

  • Split current CI pipline #17370
    Area-SourceBuild
